name: VR Room by Space View Apartments: It will take your breath away!
name_original: VR Room by Space View Apartments: It will take your breath away!
description: This project has been a long time in the making! It has all sorts of colors, baked light, grabbles, sockets, types of turning/movement, and much more. You will spawn in a room and will be able to teleport around and have fun.
